Title: Timberwolves fire head coach Ryan Saunders, hire Raptors assistant Chris Finch
Description: The Minnesota Timberwolves fired head coach Ryan Saunders on Sunday night. The Timberwolves officially hired Toronto Raptors assistant coach Chris Finch on Monday, after The Athletic's Shams Charania reported Sunday that Finch would take Saunders' place.
Author: Yahoo! Sports on MSN.com
